thread.section_title: iPhoneIMEI.Net Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iPhoneIMEI.Net | iphoneimei.net | 3 of 88
thread.title: Andy Mann

author: Andy Mann
title: Andy Mann
text: They could not unlock my phone and refused to give me a refund stating their failed attempt at unlocking the phone had cost them Â£40 without stating on their website that this would be the cost of a failed unlock. From what I can see, sending an email or making a phone call doesn't justify this amount. The phone was not stolen but part of a contract with EE. I needed to get it unlocked to use abroad. I would be very wary of site too. It provides no details on where it is based and no contact number.
